analysis.description:
UBets._finishGame (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1405-1462) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(bank - bank_use) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1456-1458)

Reentrancy in UBets.__callback (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1332-1359):
	External calls:
	- require(bool,string)(msg.sender == oraclize_cbAddress(),Permission denied) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1333-1334)
	- _finishGame(await_finish[id],numbers) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1352-1354)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _finishGame(await_finish[id],numbers) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1352-1354)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- await_finish (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1356-1359)
	- await_finish_block (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1354-1355)

Reentrancy in UBets._finishGame (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1405-1462):
	External calls:
	- bank_use = oraclize_getPrice(random,oraclize_gas_limit) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1423-1425)
	External calls sending eth:
	- owner.transfer(bank - bank_use) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1456-1458)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- games (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1458-1460)
Buffer.init (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#91-104) is declared view but contains assembly code
Buffer.append (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#124-166) is declared view but contains assembly code

usingOraclize.getCodeSize (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#788-792) is declared view but contains assembly code
usingOraclize.copyBytes (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1163-1181) is declared view but contains assembly code
usingOraclize.safeMemoryCleaner (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1270-1272) is declared view but contains assembly code

UBets.refundGame (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool,string)(await_finish_block[game_id] == 0 || await_finish_block[game_id] < block.number - 1000,Game not found)

Reentrancy in usingOraclize.oraclizeAPI (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#316-324):
	External calls:
	- address(oraclize) != OAR.getAddress() (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#321-323)
	- oraclize = OraclizeI(OAR.getAddress()) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#323)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- oraclize (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#323)
players_arr in UBets.newGame (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1475-1477) is a local variable never initialiazed
buf in usingOraclize.stra2cbor (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#941) is a local variable never initialiazed

CBOR.encodeType (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#231-249) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-buf.appendInt(value,1) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#237)
	-buf.appendInt(value,2) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#240)
	-buf.appendInt(value,4) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#245)
	-buf.appendInt(value,8) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#249)

CBOR.encodeBytes (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#266-271) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-buf.append(value) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#271)

CBOR.encodeString (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#271-276) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-buf.append(bytes(value)) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#276)

UBets._finishGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- game.players[p].send(payout) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1438-1439)

UBets._finishGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- referers[game.players[p]].send(referer_payout) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol#1448-1449)

UBets.refundGame has external calls inside a loop:
	- game.players[i].send(game.bet) (/unique_chucks/28/0x7ce60454cbc942a9003a7774f79949c05bb6d364.sol)
